CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: As a result of two more electrondonating thiophenes in the polymer backbone , the HOMO of P2 increases by 0.22 eV relative to that of P1.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P1 (the polymer with the lower HOMO level) |
| P2 (the polymer with the higher HOMO level, having two more electrodonating thiophenes in the polymer backbone) |

| --- |
| P1 |
